name: contingency_reports_review_exceptions_other_text
title: Name and/or describe the documents that you do NOT want to waive.
label: Document Exceptions
description: These are documents for which you will NOT waive the review contingency.
tips: Be specific when listing documents you want to review. Include document types and categories.
small_print: Clear identification of excluded documents helps prevent misunderstandings during the transaction.

internal.notes: Specification of documents excluded from waiver

contingency_reports_review_exceptions_ot.name: contingency_reports_review_exceptions_other_text

suggested.hint: This field is required based on your previous choices.

contingency_reports_review_exceptions_ot.tooltip: List the documents you want to exclude from the waiver

fields.name: placeholder
fields.default_value: Enter the names or descriptions of documents you want to retain the right to review
